item.title: Most Cricketers are born at the end of the year!!! Why?
item.description: Do you want to become a cricketer in India? I have a secret tip for you. If you’re born in September, October, November, or December, you’re in luck. Unfortunately, if you’re not born in any of these months, it might be tough. Perhaps consider timing the birth of your child for one of these months. You might be wondering how being born in these months increases the chances of becoming a cricketer.
